Polnareff... I want to kill you!
I want to avenge my son by ripping out your insides!
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
But I cannot let him find Hol Horse's corpse right now.
She is not behind the counter, either.
It will be even worse if the other three show up.
I need to kill them one by one, damn it.
I thought I heard some kind of crash.
I am coming in, old lady.
I just fell and banged my hip.
You recently burned your left hand, too.
Who said you could come in here, damn it?!
I will spare you my wrath for now...
But later on, I will kill you just like I killed Hol Horse!
I just need to give you a little wound...
And I can make you a puppet for my Justice to control!
You seem to be sweating a lot.
No, really, do not worry about me.
Please just go rest in your room.
But, are you running this hotel all by yourself?
Do not you have any other family?
E-Er, I was just saying I have gotten used to living alone.
Like, say your son had a wife.
Your grandkids could run around happily in the lobby.
It would be a little noisy, but...
If you had kids, would they be older than me?
Did they move to the big city, or something?
I have been totally rude, then...
You are the asshole that killed him, god damn it!
I am going to kill you!
Want me to rub your shoulders?
I lost my mother when I was really young.
This makes me think of my mom...
you can think of me as your son...
and ask anything you want of me.
Maybe I should kill you right now after all!
I guess it is really been tough on you.
You must have made your Stand disappear as soon as it
shot the bullet into your mouth!
I am the mother of Centerfold, whom you killed!
All those responsible for my son's murder will die!
I have already made sure that you cannot contact the other three.
Who the hell are you guys?!
The Indian traveler we found dead
as soon as we got to town...
This is my Stand, Justice's ability!
No one can have more than one Stand, but Justice is a fog Stand
It can control hundreds, even thousands!
Are not you taking this unjustified grudge a bit far?
To think that such a twisted Stand user was after us...
The whole town's trying to kill you.
A-And if you get wounded, this will happen...
I just need to give you a little scratch.
Then my Stand, Justice, will kill you!
I have no obligation to help you!
I am not letting you get away, Polnareff!
I will yank your brain out!
I will break your spine in half!
I will crush you to death!
I will get vengeance for my son!
Can an old woman really run this fast?!
He ran into the back room!
This is a hallway leading down to the basement.
Even if I try to contact Mr. Joestar and the others,
I am so far away now, they would never hear me!
I do not think I would lose if I fought on my own, but...
If I get even a scratch on me, I will be in trouble.
She will open a hole in me, and control me.
Is not there a way outside?
I cannot get out the windows since there are bars on them.
I will hide in this room.
That is the sound of the door breaking...
A-At this rate, I am going to have to fight.
But I cannot let them land even one scratch on me.
I hear them walking down the hallway.
They must be checking the other doors.
Damn it, they are getting closer and closer to here.
Now that I look at it, is this room a bathroom?
I always seem to get attacked in bathrooms...
Damn it, the toilet is so dirty...
But the second you walk in, my Chariot will chop up four of you in a single breath.
Now I do not hear anything.
What the hell are they doing?
Are not they going to break down the door?
What the hell are they doing?
React in some way, damn it!
They were looking in from the other side!
He stabbed me in the tongue!
You have finally fallen under my Justice's control!
Now if you do not open that door and come out on your own,
I am going to crush your face, you dumbass.
But because of your cowardly actions, my son, Centerfold,
died feeling even sadder and more pitiful!
How about we have you clean the bathroom,
Lick the toilet until it is clean.
You just walked in without knocking...
Maybe you did not hear me because you
were too busy doing something else,
Unlike Polnareff, this Jotaro is clever, and knows the right questions to ask.
The moment I act dumb, he will think that I am suspicious.
I will tell him the truth, and as soon as he turns his back to me,
I will stab him with these scissors!
After that, my Stand will beat him to death.
I know exactly where Mr. Polnareff is, Mr. Jotaro.
that even the smallest scratch will spell his doom.
Go tell Mr. Joestar and Kakyoin!
That old lady is the Stand user!
He is in the bathroom now, Mr. Jotaro.
Oh, he is in the bathroom?
Is it inside this door here?
and it is the last door at the end of the hall.
You are a child, after all!
If I kill Polnareff, it will make my son in heaven happy!
If I kill Jotaro, it will make Lord Dio in Egypt happy!
I forgot to ask, old lady...
Oh, yeah, that is really dangerous.
Thank goodness something terrible did not happen.
Sorry to ask before you even get up, but I have more questions for you.
Why did you just call me Jotaro?
I never told you my name,
and no one's said my name in front of you.
That is what I want to know.
Maybe it is because I liked Columbo as a kid,
but when something bothers me, I cannot even sleep at night.
You wrote your name on the hotel register earlier!
It is so dry in here.
I suspected you from the moment you called me Joestar when we first met.
I told the others not to use my name.
And yet, you knew my name...
It is no use playing stupid.
I already know you are one of the Stand users that is after us, old hag.
Are not you going to show me your Stand?
I have already shown it to you!
You have fallen into my trap, Jotaro!
Jotaro, it is me, Hol Horse!
Enyaba's Stand is a fog Stand.
Your wound will turn into a hole like mine,
and she will control you with the fog.
Can you punch fog with your fist?
Can you cut fog with your sword?
Can you shoot fog with your gun?
Our little Stands do not stand a chance.
There is nothing that can defeat that Stand.
Now I will control you, too, Jotaro!
You will get a hole in your leg!
There is no reason to run.
Before that old hag takes another breath,
Before I do what one more time?
Jotaro's Star Platinum has begun inhaling Justice's face...
At this rate, she will not be able to breathe!
It looks like her head is full of
the fog she liked so much.
Why does it even matter what I have been licking?
I could not hear that very well.
I want to disinfect my tongue.
Just give me the medicine already.
I thought I just heard toilet...
But I cannot resist picking on him about this!
You were just messing with me!
I will fix you right up, Polnareff.
If you do not take care of that, it will get infected.
Let us hurry back on our journey!
We step outside of the hotel, and this place is...
She was using her Stand's fog
to make this graveyard look like a town, and a hotel?
So we were talking to the corpses
that were buried in these graves...
We need to know how many more Stand users there are,
where in Egypt Dio is hiding...
And what Dio's Stand's power is.
If we are able to get the old lady
to tell us what it is,
it will give us a definite advantage.
I doubt that she would be willing to tell us, though...
We just need to use my Hermit Purple
to project what she is thinking onto a TV.
Since there is not a TV in this graveyard,
we will do it in the next town.
Yeah, I am going to stick with Dio after all.
Provided you guys do not die first, that is.
But I will give you a warning!
You should kill that old lady as quick as you can.
Otherwise, that old lady'll show you
just how terrifying Dio really is.
What the hell is he talking about?
Why are you here in front of me?
They should be able to become smaller.
When I say I am going to do something...
He just went flying like the other guy!
You do not need power to kill humans...
